document_data.name: Beaugrat
document_data.mainbody: '''Beaugrat''' was a [[barbarian]] and a member of the [[Peacekeepers]] and the [[Order of Blue Flame]].
document_data.Appearance: He was of heavy build, although he wasn't much taller than an average human.
document_data.Personality: He had a reputation of being a brawler and a bully.
document_data.History: Beaugrat was an associate of [[Duvan]] and traveled with him to the edge of the [[Underchasm]] to retrieve a valuable spellbook for [[Tyrangal]].  Beaugrat was secretly working for the Order of Blue Flame and betrayed Duvan and tried to steal the book.  Later, Beaugrat helped the Order capture Duvan for experimentation.  Beaugrat was killed by the [[monk]] [[Slanya]] when she and others from her order rescued Duvan.
document_data.Abilities: Beaugrat's spellscar allows him to project blue flames from his hands.
document_data.Equipment: Beaugrat wore [[plate mail]] that had a custom-crafted gap in the right pauldron to show his deep and jagged [[spellscar]].  He used a huge two-handed sword and wore steel spiked gauntlets.
